message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $9,800 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $10,900?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet at this price.
